message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point, and I'm happy to discuss its benefits further if you're interested.

Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the value you're offering. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

Hi Bob, thanks for your interest. I understand your perspective on the price.  While I value your offer, $14,000 is my bottom line to make this work.  I'm confident the product will exceed your expectations and provide significant value at that price.

Hi Alice, I understand that $14,000 is your bottom line, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go that high. I'd like to make a compromise and offer $12,000. I think this is a fair price considering the value you're offering, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. Would you be willing to consider this price?
